Package org.apache.juneau

Class ExtendedBeanPropertyMeta

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.ExtendedMeta
org.apache.juneau.ExtendedBeanPropertyMeta
Direct Known Subclasses:
CsvBeanPropertyMeta, HtmlBeanPropertyMeta, JsonBeanPropertyMeta, JsonSchemaBeanPropertyMeta, MsgPackBeanPropertyMeta, OpenApiBeanPropertyMeta, PlainTextBeanPropertyMeta, SoapXmlBeanPropertyMeta, UonBeanPropertyMeta, UrlEncodingBeanPropertyMeta, XmlBeanPropertyMeta
public class ExtendedBeanPropertyMeta extends ExtendedMeta
Defines extended language-specific metadata associated with a bean property.
